items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.title: miniapp-tool/mptool: A lightweight miniprogram framework

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.
items.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: Lightweight and customizable toast notifications for web applications.
items.title: andreasnicolaou/toastify: Lightweight and customizable toast notifications for web applications.

items.content_html: A backend expense tracker built with Node.js, Express, and Mongoose is a server-side application designed to efficiently manage and track financial data. It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities
items.title: Vignesh3586/Backend-Expense-Tracker: A backend expense tracker built with Node.js, Express, and Mongoose is a server-side application designed to efficiently manage and track financial data. It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible web notification library that provides a simple API for handling browser notifications using RxJS observables. It allows you to request permission, display notifications, and handle user interactions in a reactive way.
items.title: andreasnicolaou/web-notifier: A lightweight and flexible web notification library that provides a simple API for handling browser notifications using RxJS observables. It allows you to request permission, display notifications, and handle user interactions in a reactive way.

items.content_html: LeetLab is a lightweight, LeetCode-style online coding platform that allows users to write, compile, and run code in multiple programming languages directly from their browser. It uses the powerful Judge0 API as its online code execution engine.
items.title: vaibhavjethva/leetlab: LeetLab is a lightweight, LeetCode-style online coding platform that allows users to write, compile, and run code in multiple programming languages directly from their browser. It uses the powerful Judge0 API as its online code execution engine.

items.content_html: Benchmark and test of different swiper alternatives
items.title: abhinavpv7/swiper-2025: Benchmark and test of different swiper alternatives

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
items.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight reactive wrapper around EventSource using RxJS, providing automatic reconnection with backoff and jitter.
items.title: andreasnicolaou/reactive-event-source: A lightweight reactive wrapper around EventSource using RxJS, providing automatic reconnection with backoff and jitter.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
